duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain regular and accurate inventory counts, performing checks of actual inventory against electronic records
Verify, organize, label, and sort inventory items in stockroom
Uses inventory module of ERP software to keep track of orders, returns, and supply
Perform weighing & counting operations with electronic scale
Maintain a clean and organized stockroom
Maintain inventory tools and related equipment
Perform additional tasks as directed by supervisor

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
